Emperor

The only ruler of the Vakataka dynasty who held the title of 'Samrat'. He transformed the state into a powerful empire.

ЁЯФе
Vedic Sacrifices

He performed 4 Ashwamedha sacrifices and one Vajapeya sacrifice, symbolizing his sovereignty.

  • Division: After his death, the Vakataka kingdom was divided into two branches: the Pravarapura-Nandivardhana branch and the Vatsagulma branch.
